description.value:
You've learned to communicate with creatures from all over the world, overcoming language barriers to lend a hand and help where you're needed. You're affected by a constant @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Truespeech] spell.

When you attempt a Diplomacy check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Make an Impression] or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Request], you can spend 1 Mythic Point to make the check at mythic proficiency.
